root: ^I hope this message finds you well. We’ve managed to rebalance our economy thanks to the agreements you helped set up with our Hattusan friend. Well, I can’t say the same for the rest of the island, but one thing we all have an excess of is seafood.
^I’m in a generous mood, and I hear you’re starting to experience troubles down in Egypt too, so perhaps we could offer a relief shipment? Just point me where you want it.

Port2: ^An unorthodox response, but they do seem in need. It will be sent at once. You know, I think I’m starting to get a read on you. You’re not an arm of the state at all anymore, are you?
